comments.body: can you test all of the exposed methods / properties

The only thing I could test on the dummy ones is `kind`, which returns just 'O' and `names`, which I'm hopeful we can remove.

All the other methods are abstract or rely on an abstract method.

I do have real classes that implement the interface, but waiting for the interface to settle a bit before rewriting those classes and the tests.
